overview:
James G. Naro was appointed Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary of LodgeNet Interactive Corporation (NASD: LNET) in June 2006. Mr. Naro is responsible for the companyâ€™s legal affairs and for guiding its corporate compliance and intellectual property strategy.

With more than 28 years of legal experience, Mr. Naroâ€™s background spans intellectual property management and licensing; multinational mergers, acquisitions and joint ventures; public and private financing; and corporate governance and regulatory compliance.
